text: Tæ brrda phu thi yakerng phracea khxng phwk khea nan sahrab phwk khea khux brrda swn swrrkh sung mi mæna hlay say hil xyu beuxng lang khxng swn swrrkh hela nan doythi phwk khea ca phanak xyu nı swn swrrkh hela nan tlxd kal thangni pen sthan thi rabrxng thima ca kxallxhˌ læa sing thi mi xyu n xallxhˌ nan khux sing thi di ying sahrab phu thi pen khn di thanghlay
